thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 02 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Highpower International Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.31

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Highpower International Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.31
text:
April 2 (Reuters) - Highpower International Inc:
* HIGHPOWER INTERNATIONAL REPORTS UNAUDITED FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE UP MORE THAN 10 PERCENT * ‍”ARE OPTIMISTIC ABOUT OUR GROWTH IN 2018 AND BEYOND”​
* ‍SETTING UP PRODUCTION WORKSHOP IN HUIZHOU FACILITY,; EXPECTED TO REACH TARGET DAILY PRODUCTION VOLUME OF 100,000 PIECES BY Q2
* ‍A NEW BUILDING IN HUIZHOU FACILITY WILL BE COMPLETED BY MAY 2019​
* Q1 REVENUE GUIDANCE OF OVER 10 PERCENT GROWTH EXCLUDES GANZHOU HIGHPOWER IMPACT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
